author: LINDA MERICA

review: It's sleek, sexy, and well-crafted, from the packaging to the product. The box it comes in is very cleanly designed. Open it up and it has accommodated every convenience you can think of. Performance and setup wise, the Chromecast is super simple and streamline. It also streams a majority of streaming web services without additional installations. My primary beef is how easy it overheats, but that's to be expected if you use it continuously for hours.
author: Andrew

review: The wireless connection on this could be better. I have used this to chromecast my chrome browser to my tv so I can watch videos through Google Chrome on my laptop. It skips a lot so I have gone back to just connecting my laptop to my tv via HDMI.
author: Phil

review: This is a great device and it gets better with Google opening up the API to regular developers to build more apps for it.  Using Youtube and streaming NAS mounted from my android device is my main use.

review: Brought it with the netflix deal and it was a game changer. The connectivity is flawless for the app enabled devices. However when chrome is mirrored, there is some amount of buffering. A fantastic device to enjoy viewing programs on the big screen. One great deal is when chrome cast is selected, it switches on the TV through the AV receiver its connected to. This helps the user not to select the HDMI channel everytime  the TV is switched on.
